name: My Friend's Game
description:
Note: This game was made for the Mini Jame Gam #10 with a theme of "Reality is Breaking" and a special object, "Telephone". 
All assets were created by us, except for the player movement, the dialogue system .

"My Friend's Game" is a simple platformer where the main character plays his friend's buggy game, this whole thing eventually turns into a mess, let's see if you can make it out alive.

Instructions:

  • "W", "A", "S", "D" or the arrow keys to move
  • "Space" to jump.
  • "Mouse" to aim & "Left-Click" to shoot

Asset Credits:

  • Dialogue system: Fungus
  • Movmement : Ultimate-2D-Controller

Technologies:

  • Unity
  • C#
  • Aseprite
  • Reason

We hope you enjoy :3
